Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Bathi ke ukugqitha kwabo kuyo, (uMûsâ) wathi kwinkwenkwana yakhe, “Sizisele isidlo sethu sakusasa. Sibulaleke kakhulu kolu hambo lwethu, sidiniwe nokudinwa.”

Wathi: “Ubonile ngokuya besiphumle kweliyaa litye? Ndiye ndayilibala intlanzi. Kunjalo nje akukho wumbi undilahlekisileyo ngaphandle koShaytân ondenze ndayilibala. Ukanti yona ithabathe indlela yayo elwandle ngokumangalisayo.”
UMûsâ wathi: “Leyo yiyo kanye into ebesiyikhangela.” Babuyela emva belandela imizila yeenyawo zabo
Ke kaloku bafumana omnye weziCaka zeThu, eSathoba uBabalo oluvela kuThi phezu kwakhe, neSamfundisa nolwazi oluvela kuThi
UMûsâ wathi kuye (uRhadir): “Ndingakulandela na khon’ukuze undifundise okuthile kolo lwazi lwakho lwesiKhokelo walufundiswayo?”
Wathi yena: “Inene, wena akungekhe ukwazi ukuba nomonde (wokunyamezelana) nam
UMûsâ wathi: “Uya kundifumana mna ndinomonde ukuba uAllâh Uthandile yaye andiyi kungakuthobeli nangawuphi na umyalelo.”
Wathi yena: “Ukuba uyandilandela ke uze ungandibuzi nangantoni na (endiyenzayo) ndide ndikuchazele (ngayo).”
Bahamba ke bada bakhwela enqanaweni. (URhadir) wayigrobhoza imboba (inqanawa). UMûsâ wathi: “Uyigrobhozela ukuba mayitshonise abantu bayo na?” Inene wenze eyona nto imbi kunene!”
(URhadir) wathi: “Bendingatshongo na kuwe ukuba wena akungekhe unyamezelane nam?”
Wathi (uMûsâ): “Ungandigxeki ngokulibala kwam, ungandibeki ebunzimeni ngesenzo sam.”
Baqhubeka ke (bahamba) bada badibana nenkwenkwana, waza wayibulala. (uRhadir). UMûsâ wathi: “Ubulele umntu ongenatyala ongabulalanga mntu? Inene wenze into elisikizi gqitha!”
